text: Islington North is a constituency in the House of Commons of the UK Parliament. The seat has been held since 1983 by Jeremy Corbyn of the Labour Party. Corbyn was Leader of the Labour Party and the Leader of the Opposition from September 2015 to April 2020. At , it is the smallest UK Parliamentary constituency.Parliamentary constituencies, UK Parliament official website. Accessed 12 August 2015. ==Election results== ==References== Category:Westminster Parliamentary constituencies in England
title: Islington North (UK Parliament constituency)
